name: Kuse
tagline: If ChatGPT, Notion, and a whiteboard had a genius baby
description: Kuse turns messy inputs into structured deliverables, all on a canvas where your context is visual, editable, and reusable. Chaos in, genius out.

name: Move AI
tagline: Relocate as fast as you ship
description: Tell us where you're going, snap some photos, and we'll get you fixed quotes from hand-picked vendors. Typical process takes ~ 1-2 weeks.

name: stagewise
tagline: The frontend coding agent for existing codebases
description: Visually build your apps frontend right inside your browser on localhost. Compatible with any frontend framework and codebase.

name: GPT-5 SEO Brand Visiblity
tagline: Find out what GPT-5 thinks about your brand & competitors
description: Find out what GPT-5 knows about your brand & competitors.

name: PersonaRoll
tagline: Automatically go viral just by being you
description: Upload your photos, let AI match them with trending topics, then watch as your personas create authentic content in their unique voices - all powered by real knowledge from your feeds and sources.

name: GitRanks
tagline: GitHub Profile Analytics & Rankings
description: Explore rankings based on stars, contributions, and followers. Dive into dynamic leaderboards to see how you rank against developers worldwide and within your own country.

name: Readdit Later
tagline: Save and manage your Reddit posts with ease
description: Readdit Later helps you save, search and organize Reddit posts effortlessly. Syncs your saved posts and gives you a clean dashboard to filter, sort, and bulk-manage your finds.

name: Claude Utils
tagline: Paste images into Claude Code like magic
description: Ever tried pasting a screenshot into Claude Code? Yeah, it doesn't work. You need to save the file, locate it, and then drag it in. Every. Single. Time. Claude-utils fixes this.

name: Relyable
tagline: Simulation & monitoring platform for AI voice agents
description: Relyable let's you ship high performing AI Voice Agents quick. Run simulated conversations between AI Agents & Evaluate Live Calls. Relyable has a native integration with Vapi & Retell AI.

name: Parachute Backup Mobile
tagline: Keep your iCloud Data. Forever. Now on iPhone and iPad
description: Parachute for iOS is a set-and-forget backup companion for iCloud Photos and iCloud Drive. It keeps your memories and documents safe by backing them up to your own storage.

name: VIVE Eagle AI Glasses
tagline: Your AI companion, in a stylish frame
description: HTC VIVE's new AI glasses feature live translation, Bluetooth connectivity, and crisp audio—sleek, stylish, and lightweight for everyday use.

name: Dabe Agents
tagline: Build AI agents by describing your tasks
description: Create AI agents for any task in 1 minute. Each agent works independently with 350+ apps. Build your AI team in minutes.

name: Genstack
tagline: The Universal AI SDK
description: Genstack's mission is to create the universal AI SDK. Try a different model, change how the model responds, fix grammar- all within Genstack Cloud. It’s easy, quick, and secure.

name: LetzAI
tagline: Generative AI to which you can add yourself
description: The AI platform to which you can add yourself, your products, and your style.

name: VeoSpark
tagline: Product to AI Quality Veo 3 Ads without holes in your wallet
description: Stop wasting 30 generations on disconnected scenes. Our pipeline creates complete viral ad scripts that lets you draft visualize and churn out AI generated ad videos easily, letting you continue from a chosen frame using production-quality prompt templates!

name: UXSnaps
tagline: Uncover the UI secrets behind apps used by millions
description: Explore real UI/UX breakdowns from billion-dollar apps. Actionable lessons, visual insights, and patterns you can apply. Built for designers & product teams.

name: SupaBird Followers Map
tagline: See where your X followers are around the globe
description: I would often travel and wonder if there are any people in this new place who are following me. So I created this free tool to show locations of your followers from X. Location is shown if your account if public and location is visible on your profile.

name: Fellow API
tagline: Build custom workflows from meeting transcripts and AI notes
description: Whether you need to archive compliance records, trigger workflows when key terms appear, feed dashboards with fresh insights, or pass transcripts to an LLM for tailored recaps and action plans, Fellow's API gives you everything you need to make it happen.

name: Braiv Player
tagline: One video, multiple languages
description: Braiv Player, the worlds 1st multi-language player and fastest way to scale online video to global audiences: 💡 AI-generated, animated captions 🌍 Instant multi-language dubbing 🧬 One video, multiple languages 🎓 Built for online educators & marketers

name: Vidatia AI Video Maker
tagline: Create jaw-dropping videos in minutes with just an idea
description: Want to create trending videos? Vidatia is an all-in-one AI video creator studio that writes, narrates, edits, and produces stunning, faceless videos for socials from just an idea. Say goodbye to content overwhelm & hello to jaw-dropping videos
